suite.name: Smoketest

test.name: Start Video Recording

kw.name: Start Video Recording
kw.doc: Starts the recording of a video in the background with the specified ``name``. The recording can be stopped by calling the `Stop Video Recording` keyword.

test.name: Verify the Sale Popup appears

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.msg: Text 'CYBER WEEK SALE NOW $300 OFF + FREE PILLOW' did not appear in 5 seconds.

test.status: Text 'CYBER WEEK SALE NOW $300 OFF + FREE PILLOW' did not appear in 5 seconds.

test.name: Stop Video Recording

kw.name: Stop All Video Recordings
kw.doc: Stops all the video recordings and generates the files in WebM format. If ``embed`` argument was set to ``True`` the videos will be displayed in the log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc: This is for checking all the places where we should update the seasonal promotion
